metadata.Title: CVE-2020-21047 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The libcpu component which is used by libasm of elfutils version 0.177 (git 47780c9e), suffers from denial-of-service vulnerability caused by application crashes due to out-of-bounds write (CWE-787), off-by-one error (CWE-193) and reachable assertion (CWE-617); to exploit the vulnerability, the attackers need to craft certain ELF files which bypass the missing bound checks.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-21047` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

debuginfod - 0.186-1build1
elfutils - 0.186-1build1
libasm1 - 0.186-1build1
libdebuginfod-common - 0.186-1build1
libdebuginfod1 - 0.186-1build1
libdw1 - 0.186-1build1
libelf1 - 0.186-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: elfutils package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.186-1build1').
